isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - Before 12/06/1994 - MAINTENANCE - AIR Water Valve Adjustment (Used With A/C Units)

svcproc.title: AIR Water Valve Adjustment (Used With A/C Units)

svcprocinfo.para: The water valve should be adjusted so that the valve is full on when the Blend-Air door is closed with about 25% compression of the door seal.

step1.para: Remove cover from right side of instrument panel.
Lift control link off water valve control lever.
Move valve control lever against stop tab in full ON position.
Rotate adjuster until control link can be placed on valve lever with door closed and seal compressed approximately 25%.
Turn control assembly knobs to the extreme left:

step2.para: Temperature control knob in HOT position.
AIR OUTLET knob in CAB position.

step1.para: Lift the control link off the water valve control lever.
Move valve control lever against stop tab in full ON position.
Rotate adjuster until the control link can be placed on valve lever with door closed and seal compressed approximately 25%.

svcsubproc.title: Air Blend Door Control Cable Adjustment

step1.para: Turn control assembly knobs to the extreme left:

step2.para: Temperature control knob in HOT position.
AIR OUTLET knob in CAB position.

note.para: These knob positions must be maintained during adjustment.

step1.para: Rotate cable adjusters ( Figure 10) to lengthen cable and obtain mid-travel position of Blend-Air door.

figure.caption: Figure 10. Control Cable Adjuster - Air Conditioning/Heater Models

step1.para: Rotate cable adjuster (shorten cables) as needed to obtain the following settings with cable free from binding:

step2.para: Blend-Air door closed with about 25% compression of the door seal and hot water flow control valve in ON position.
Defrost door knob at CAB position.

step1.para: Rotate control panel knob several times and check to assure that proper adjustment is maintained.

svcsubproc.para: If necessary, repeat Steps 2, 3 and 4 to obtain proper adjustment.

step1.para: Install covers on Blend-Air unit housing and instrument panel.
